sentences.en: Applicable industries: advertisement, arts and crafts leather, toys, garments, model, building upholster, computerized embroidery and clipping, packaging and paper industry.
sentences.cn: 适用行业: 广告, 工艺品,皮革, 玩具, 服装, 模型, 建筑装潢, 电脑绣花裁剪, 包装业和纸业.

sentences.en: Many articles in popular magazines are devoted to instruction in gardening, carpentry, upholster and interior decorating.
sentences.cn: 很多通俗杂志的文章致力于传授园艺, 木工,装饰家具,室内装饰技能.

sentences.en: The young couple plan to upholster their bedroom with velvet.
sentences.cn: 小俩口打算用天鹅绒装饰他们的卧室.

sentences.en: Yesterday we were leveraging classical upholster and modern produce ironbrand in elevator manufacturing.
sentences.cn: 我们提供电梯装潢设计、制造、安装、维修的全程化服务,专业配套于国际国内一流的电梯制造企业.

words.tran_cn: 家具装饰用品业；垫衬物
装饰；用（挂毯、家具等）布置；为（沙发等）装上垫子

trans.tran_cn: 装饰；用（挂毯、家具等）布置；为（沙发等）装上垫子
trans.tran_en: to cover a chair with material

trans.tran_cn: 为…装上垫子[套子、弹簧等]，布置，装潢
